verbs.description: [ARG0: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer ( D - N.Y. )] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: that Democrats would reject Congressional efforts to ban the policy separating migrant children from their families in order to keep the focus on President Donald Trump] . Vice President Mike Pence responded by criticizing him for choosing politics over solutions to the crisis . Here 's what he said Schumer addressed the crisis of families being separated at the border on Tuesday , but rejected two bills that Republicans had offered as solution to the policy some called " cruel . " “ There are so many obstacles to legislation and when the president can do it with his own pen , it makes no sense , ” Schumer said to reporters Tuesday . “ Legislation is not the way to go here when it ’s so easy for the president to sign it . ” Democrats have accused the administration of purposely changing immigration policy in order to separate families as a deterrent against illegal immigration , but the Trump administration …
